mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, LOGIN_NAME, EMAIL, REGISTER_TIME, SEX, CELLPHONE, CERT_NO, F1, F2 FROM hz7.to_horizon_user WHERE LOGIN_NAME=#{userName} AND PASSWORD=#{passWord} AND ACTIVE='1'
SELECT count(*) FROM hz7.to_horizon_user where LOGIN_NAME=#{userName}
SELECT ID FROM hz7.to_horizon_dept WHERE PARENT_ID IN (SELECT id FROM hz7.to_horizon_dept WHERE DEPT_LEVEL = 0) and DEPT_NAME= #{dept}
SELECT DEPT_LEVEL FROM hz7.to_horizon_dept where ID=#{deptId}
SELECT ID FROM hz7.tor_horizon_user_dept where USER_ID=#{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hz7.to_horizon_user (ID, NAME, LOGIN_NAME, EMAIL, REGISTER_TIME,PASSWORD, SEX, CELLPHONE, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NO, F1, F2,ACTIVE,CERTIFICATE) VALUES (#{uid}, #{name}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{date},#{passWord}, #{sex}, #{tel}, '0', #{idCard}, #{filesId}, #{deptId},'1','password')
INSERT INTO hz7.tor_horizon_user_dept (ID, USER_ID, DEPT_ID, JOIN_TIME, ACTIVE, ORDER_NO, ISDEFAULT) VALUES (#{id}, #{uid}, #{deptId}, #{time},'1', '0', '1')
INSERT INTO signin (adress, latitude, longitude, time, company, compId, uid, comments) VALUES (#{adress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{time}, #{company}, #{compId}, #{uid}, #{comments});
